azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider=="MICROSOFT.DOCUMENTDB" and Category == "DataPlaneRequests" and Resource == "NGSA-ASB-PRE-COSMOS2"
| where databaseName_s == "imdb"
| where statusCode_s == 429
| count

//change this example to create your own time series query
<table name>                                                              //the table to query (e.g. Usage, Heartbeat, Perf)
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)                                      //this is a macro used to show the full chart’s time range, choose the datetime column here
| summarize count() by <group by column>, bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval) //change “group by column” to a column in your table, such as “Computer”. The $__interval macro is used to auto-select the time grain. Can also use 1h, 5m etc.
| order by TimeGenerated asc

//change this example to create your own time series query
<table name>                                                              //the table to query (e.g. Usage, Heartbeat, Perf)
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)                                      //this is a macro used to show the full chart’s time range, choose the datetime column here
| summarize count() by <group by column>, bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval) //change “group by column” to a column in your table, such as “Computer”. The $__interval macro is used to auto-select the time grain. Can also use 1h, 5m etc.
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AzureMetrics 
| where MetricName == "ProvisionedThroughput" and Resource == "NGSA-ASB-PRE-COSMOS2"
| summarize max(Count)

ngsa_CL
| where  k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize RequestSuccessRate = round(100.0*countif(StatusCode_d < 400)/count(),4)
| project RequestSuccessRate

ngsa_CL
| where  k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize RequestSuccessRate = round(100.0*countif(StatusCode_d < 400)/count(),4)
| project RequestSuccessRate

ngsa_CL
| where  k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize RequestSuccessRate = round(100.0*countif(StatusCode_d < 400)/count(),4)
| project RequestSuccessRate

ngsa_CL
| where  $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos" 

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| summarize RequestSuccessRate = 100.0 * countif(StatusCode_d < 400) / count() by bin_at(Date_t, 2m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t

ngsa_CL
| where  $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
   and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory" 

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| summarize RequestSuccessRate = 100.0 * countif(StatusCode_d < 400) / count() by bin_at(Date_t, 2m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t

ngsa_CL
| where  $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
   and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java" 

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| summarize RequestSuccessRate = 100.0 * countif(StatusCode_d < 400) / count() by bin_at(Date_t, 2m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize FailedRequestCount=countif(StatusCode_d >= 400)
| project FailedRequestCount

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize FailedRequestCount=countif(StatusCode_d >= 400)
| project FailedRequestCount

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize FailedRequestCount=countif(StatusCode_d >= 400)
| project FailedRequestCount

let _series_data = materialize(
ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and  k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos"  

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)   
| summarize FailedRequests=countif(StatusCode_d >= 400) by StatusCode_d , bin(Date_t, 1m) );



_series_data 
| summarize sum(FailedRequests) by Date_t
| project-rename FailedRequests=sum_FailedRequests

| order by Date_t asc

let _series_data = materialize(
ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and  k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory"  

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| summarize FailedRequests=countif(StatusCode_d >= 400) by StatusCode_d , bin(Date_t, 1m) );



_series_data 
| summarize sum(FailedRequests) by Date_t
| project-rename FailedRequests=sum_FailedRequests
| order by Date_t asc

let _series_data = materialize(
ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and  k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java"  

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| summarize FailedRequests=countif(StatusCode_d >= 400) by StatusCode_d , bin(Date_t, 1m) );



_series_data 
| summarize sum(FailedRequests) by Date_t
| project-rename FailedRequests=sum_FailedRequests
| order by Date_t asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
  and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize count() by bin(Date_t,1m)
| summarize round(avg(count_),0)
| project AvgRequests=avg_count_

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
  and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize count() by bin(Date_t,1m)
| summarize round(avg(count_),0)
| project AvgRequests=avg_count_

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
  and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize count() by bin(Date_t,1m)
| summarize round(avg(count_),0)
| project AvgRequests=avg_count_

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos"
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)   
| summarize count() by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t,ServerRequests=count_
| order by Date asc

ngsa_CL
| where  $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and  k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory" 

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
    and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)  
| summarize count() by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ServerRequests=count_
| order by Date asc

ngsa_CL
| where  $__timeFilter(Date_t)
   and  k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java" 

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
    and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)  
| summarize count() by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ServerRequests=count_
| order by Date asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
    and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-cosmos" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"

   and StatusCode_d >= 400
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| summarize count() by tostring(toint(StatusCode_d)), Path_s, Zone_s
| project-rename StatusCode=StatusCode_d,RequestCount=count_,Path=Path_s, Zone=Zone_s

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
    and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-memory" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"

   and StatusCode_d >= 400
    and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)  
| summarize count() by tostring(toint(StatusCode_d)), Path_s, Zone_s
| project-rename StatusCode=StatusCode_d,RequestCount=count_,Path=Path_s, Zone=Zone_s

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
    and k_container_s == "app" 
   and k_app_s == "ngsa-java" 
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"

   and StatusCode_d >= 400
    and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)  
| summarize count() by tostring(toint(StatusCode_d)), Path_s, Zone_s
| project-rename StatusCode=StatusCode_d,RequestCount=count_,Path=Path_s, Zone=Zone_s

loderunner_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) and StatusCode_d > 200 and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
| extend AppType = case(Server_s contains 'ngsa-memory', "ngsa-memory", 
                      Server_s contains 'ngsa-cosmos', "ngsa-cosmos", 
                      Server_s contains 'ngsa-java', "ngsa-java", 
                       "unknown!")
| summarize countif(StatusCode_d > 200) by AppType, Zone_s, StatusCode_d
| project-rename FailureCount=countif_, Zone=Zone_s, StatusCode=StatusCode_d
| order by AppType, Zone, StatusCode

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
   and k_container_s == 'app'
   and k_app_s == 'ngsa-cosmos'
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog" 
   and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Zone_s, k_app_s
| extend Zone=Zone_s, 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2), AppType=k_app_s
| project AppType, Zone, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Zone asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
   and k_container_s == 'app'
   and k_app_s == 'ngsa-memory'
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
      and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Zone_s, k_app_s
| extend Zone=Zone_s, 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2), AppType=k_app_s
| project AppType, Zone, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Zone asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) 
   and k_container_s == 'app'
   and k_app_s == 'ngsa-java'
   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
      and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)

| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Zone_s, k_app_s
| extend Zone=Zone_s, 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2), AppType=k_app_s
| project AppType, Zone, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Zone asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
    and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == 'ngsa-cosmos'

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ResponseTime_75th=percentile_Duration_d_75, ResponseTime_90th=percentile_Duration_d_90,  ResponseTime_95th=percentile_Duration_d_95, ResponseTime_98th=percentile_Duration_d_98
| order by Date asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
    and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == 'ngsa-memory'

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ResponseTime_75th=percentile_Duration_d_75, ResponseTime_90th=percentile_Duration_d_90,  ResponseTime_95th=percentile_Duration_d_95, ResponseTime_98th=percentile_Duration_d_98
| order by Date asc

ngsa_CL
| where $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any ($Zone)
    and k_container_s == "app"
   and k_app_s == 'ngsa-java'

   and LogName_s == "Ngsa.RequestLog"
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ResponseTime_75th=percentile_Duration_d_75, ResponseTime_90th=percentile_Duration_d_90,  ResponseTime_95th=percentile_Duration_d_95, ResponseTime_98th=percentile_Duration_d_98
| order by Date asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-cosmos' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| extend AppType = 'ngsa-cosmos'
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Zone_s, AppType
| extend Zone=Zone_s, 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2), AppType
| project AppType, Zone, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Zone asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-memory' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| extend AppType = 'ngsa-memory'
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Zone_s, AppType
| extend Zone=Zone_s, 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2), AppType
| project AppType, Zone, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Zone asc

| extend AppType = 'ngsa-java'
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Zone_s, AppType
| extend Zone=Zone_s, 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2), AppType
| project AppType, Zone, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Zone asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-cosmos' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ResponseTime_75th=percentile_Duration_d_75, ResponseTime_90th=percentile_Duration_d_90, ResponseTime_95th=percentile_Duration_d_95, ResponseTime_98th=percentile_Duration_d_98
| order by Date asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-memory' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))
| project-rename Date=Date_t, ResponseTime_75th=percentile_Duration_d_75, ResponseTime_90th=percentile_Duration_d_90, ResponseTime_95th=percentile_Duration_d_95, ResponseTime_98th=percentile_Duration_d_98
| order by Date asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-java' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by bin_at(Date_t, 1m, datetime(00:00))

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-cosmos' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| extend AppType = 'ngsa-cosmos'
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Category, AppType
| extend 75th=round(percentile_Duration_d_75,2), 90th=round(percentile_Duration_d_90,2), 95th=round(percentile_Duration_d_95,2), 98th=round(percentile_Duration_d_98,2)
| project AppType, Category, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Category asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-memory' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| extend AppType = 'ngsa-memory'
| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Category, AppType

loderunner_CL

| summarize percentile(Duration_d, 75), percentile(Duration_d, 90), percentile(Duration_d, 95), percentile(Duration_d, 98) by Category, AppType

| project AppType, Category, 75th, 90th, 95th, 98th
| order by AppType, Category asc

loderunner_CL
| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-cosmos' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| sample 7000
| project-rename ResponseTime=Duration_d, Date=Date_t
| project ResponseTime, Category, Date
| order by Date asc

| where Server_s contains 'ngsa-memory' and $__timeFilter(Date_t) and Zone_s has_any($Zone)
| sample 7000

| project ResponseTime, Category, Date
